content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"About \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is now growing evidence that when employees are happy, organizations thrive.   \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition is a strategic business practice in the form of positive feedback that acknowledges people for who they are and what they do. It fundamentally changes the employee experience, becoming the greatest competitive advantage in the modern economy.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Benefits \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition helps employees to feel valued, engaged, and realize the individual impact one has on the company's success. As a result, it helps the company to achieve its business goals such as higher productivity, lower turnover and absence, less burnout. It boosts creativity and innovation. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It helps to connect, and make bonds among people establishing meaningful employee networks, especially in our New Normal remote environment.  Remote workers, who lack regular face-to-face interactions with peers, have unique challenges when it comes to forming these bonds with coworkers. One of the best ways to accomplish ongoing team interaction is through recognition. When recognition flows consistently and visibly throughout the organization, it builds a sense of connection among the team. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Workers, though they are disconnected physically, can stay connected with each other through work accomplishments and expressions of support for personal occasions like birthdays, or other life occasions.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"More than that, \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.gallup.com/workplace/329351/add-team-praise-employee-recognition-toolkit.aspx\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"praising employees \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"encourages collaboration\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" by de-incentivizing self-protective behavior like information hoarding. More than half of the people on teams that are recognized strongly agree that they \\\"openly share information, knowledge and ideas with each other.\\\" \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"clarifies organizational goals\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", which can enhance agility in the internal supply chain to the customer.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"reinforces a team's sense of meaning and purpose\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". 74% of those who say their team receives praise also strongly agree that they \\\"have the feeling that what [they are] doing at work is valuable and useful.\\\"  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"improves quality\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Workers on praised teams are more likely than those on other teams to strongly agree that their coworkers always do what's right for the customer. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"inspires trust\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". Indeed, 66% of those on adequately praised teams strongly agree with this statement: \\\"I trust the colleagues with whom I work on a regular basis.\\\" \",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Core \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":53678,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e151de22-c304-4370-9aa6-e64bf7fead85/core \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMRCGA/Recognition+concept\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"principles\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", or employee recognition criteria, are essential to observe for the successful application of employee recognition in the workplace: \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{\"size\":53678,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c871226f-42f2-46ce-98e3-4bde6c8d6fb2/core principles.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c871226f-42f2-46ce-98e3-4bde6c8d6fb2/core principles.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"core principles.png\",\"name\":\"core principles.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c871226f-42f2-46ce-98e3-4bde6c8d6fb2\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":500,\"height\":510},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Management role in recognition     \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Role model \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As with all people-based initiatives, management’s support and participation are essential to establish a true recognition culture. Leadership modeling the recognition behaviors desired from all employees is the most effective way to communicate to everyone that this is important, and it is the behavior to follow. Without management walking the talk, the culture won’t happen. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Authority \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The work of managers is crucial to a strategic approach to recognition in the organization. First of all, you are the ones who have access to the most important information, that is the workload and achievements of a given employee and you are in the right position to give immediate, spontaneous positive feedback. The second reason is that your recognition has the highest importance for employees. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Be specific \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It should be given for specific behaviors, not just generic qualities.  Employees especially value types of recognition that memorialize their efforts/results. Also, consider that everyone should be comfortable and clear reading your message and understand the context. To do this try to use the PAR technique (problem-action-result) and tell a coherent story of what exactly they’re being recognized for. Stories are powerful, evoke emotion and support memorable appreciation moments. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When to recognize \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":172419,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0c7252ca-98ce-4bf8-ba99-b7ae54200728/map.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0c7252ca-98ce-4bf8-ba99-b7ae54200728/map.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"map.png\",\"name\":\"map.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0c7252ca-98ce-4bf8-ba99-b7ae54200728\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":585.0188811188812},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Recognition is a continuous process. By providing consistent ongoing feedback, you show your team that what they do matters to you, and you are noticing them—and it inspires them to work better. Recognition should be happening regularly throughout the whole employee’s journey in the company, consistently incorporated into day-to-day activities. \\n\\n\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Types of recognition:  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We can recognize good performance, being proactive and going the extra mile on a project, and contributions to corporate processes/initiatives or this could be celebration of people personal moments which helps to build stronger social connections.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"It can be public or personal that depends on contribution scale and type of personality you recognize. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"You can recognize teams or individuals.  \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Our current recognition framework is based on a variety of recognition sources, because it’s important for employees to get acknowledgement of their achievements on various levels. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The preferred mix of recognition sources is the following: 30 percent recognition from peers, 20 percent recognition from the organization, and a full 50 percent recognition from the manager.   \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The means of recognition can be both tangible and intangible. You can customize it to see badges that were assigned within your project/location/unit only by enabling\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Suggested news \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"option or applying appropriate filters. As well as Feedback process, Heroes portal and badges provide managers with useful information on teams' progress, success, and achievements. And as any feedback, it should be communicated to teammates in a consistent, timely and regular manner. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMHRMKB/Talk+in+Telescope\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Talk process and Talk functionality\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" in Telescope can help you support ongoing communication with your team. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There is another tool to check teams’ contribution and achievements. \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"PowerBI\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" can give you a picture of the most recently given and received badges by your teams. Use filters for customized search that fits your needs. Check out the most popular badges and valuable comments to get more information about team’s contribution and extra miles. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":92137,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/42dd16d5-dd0e-43d1-aa86-95a25fa322bd/2021-11-26_13h16_16.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/42dd16d5-dd0e-43d1-aa86-95a25fa322bd/2021-11-26_13h16_16.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"2021-11-26_13h16_16.png\",\"name\":\"2021-11-26_13h16_16.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"42dd16d5-dd0e-43d1-aa86-95a25fa322bd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029,\"height\":466.0927419354839},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We have been working on simplifying recognition with integrations to make it easy to praise each other right on spot after meetings or 1-on-1s in MS Teams with the help of\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://videoportal.epam.com/video/dYPkxEa2\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Chat Bot\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" or from your mobile device via\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" EPAM Connect\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\". You can also send your worlds of gratitude right from the Video Portal, Community-Z, Teams DC and other.
